requirement: Ban Nha Nong (BNN) Ltd., a software development company in Vietnam, is dedicated to creating and supporting software solutions that integrate information technology into rural areas. Recognizing the significant market opportunity presented by Vietnam's large farming population, BNN aims to launch www.hailua.com.vn, an e-commerce platform designed to connect farmers directly with consumers. Farmers can register with a bank account, list their products (rice, fruits, fish, etc.) with detailed descriptions, images, and prices, and receive payments upon sales. Customers can browse, search for specific produces, compare prices, make online payments, and arrange for delivery, similar to platforms like Amazon and eBay. The initial system will focus on core functionalities, enabling online posting, selling, and purchasing of agricultural products with online payment and shipping capabilities.
